Title: Cellar
Description:
+1 Action
Discard any number of cards.
+1 Card per card discarded.

Title: Chapel
Description: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

Title: Moat
Description:
+2 Cards
When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

Title: Chancellor
Description:
+$2
You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

Title: Village
Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions.

Title: Workshop
Description: Gain a card costing up to $4.

Title: Bureaucrat
Description: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

Title: Feast
Description: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to $5.

Title: Gardens
Description: Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

Title: Militia
Description:
+$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

Title: Moneylender
Description: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +$3.

Title: Remodel
Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.

Title: Smithy
Description: +3 Cards.

Title: Spy
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

Title: Thief
Description: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

Title: Throne Room
Description: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

Title: Council Room
Description:
+4 Cards; +1 Buy
Each other player draws a card.

Title: Festival
Description: +2 Actions, +1 Buy; +$2.

Title: Laboratory
Description: +2 Cards; +1 Action.

Title: Library
Description: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

Title: Market
Description: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$1.

Title: Mine
Description: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to $3 more; put it into your hand.

Title: Witch
Description:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Curse card.

Title: Adventurer
Description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

Title: Courtyard
Description:
+3 Cards
Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

Title: Pawn
Description:
Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$1.
(The choices must be different.)

Title: Secret Chamber
Description:
Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded.
When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

Title: Great Hall
Description:
1 Victory Point
+1 Card; +1 Action.

Title: Masquerade
Description:
+2 Cards
Each player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. You may trash a card from your hand.

Title: Shanty Town
Description:
+2 Actions
Reveal your hand.  If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

Title: Steward
Description: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +$2; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

Title: Swindler
Description:
+$2
Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

Title: Wishing Well
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

Title: Baron
Description:
+1 Buy
You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +$4.  Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

Title: Bridge
Description:
+1 Buy; +$1
All cards (including cards in players’ hands) cost $1 less this turn, but not less than $0.

Title: Conspirator
Description:
+$2
If you’ve played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card; +1 Action.

Title: Coppersmith
Description: Copper produces an extra $1 this turn.

Title: Ironworks
Description: Gain a card costing up to $4. If it is an… Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +$1. Victory card, +1 Card.

Title: Mining Village
Description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +$2.

Title: Scout
Description:
+1 Action
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

Title: Duke
Description: Worth 1 Victory Point per Duchy you have.

Title: Minion
Description:
+1 Action
Choose one: +$2; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

Title: Saboteur
Description: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing $3 or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most $2 less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

Title: Torturer
Description:
+3 Cards
Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

Title: Trading Post
Description: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

Title: Tribute
Description: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an… Action Card; +2 Actions; Treasure Card; +$2; Victory Card; +2 Cards.

Title: Upgrade
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $1 more than it.

Title: Harem
Description:
Worth $2
2 Victory Points

Title: Nobles
Description:
2 Victory Points
Choose one: +3 Cards; or +2 Actions.

Title: Embargo
Description:
+$2
Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile.
When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

Title: Haven
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Title: Lighthouse
Description:
+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +$1.
While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn’t affect you.

Title: Native Village
Description:
+2 Actions
Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.  You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

Title: Pearl Diver
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Title: Ambassador (part II)
Description: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

Title: Fishing Village
Description:
+2 Actions, +$1
At the start of your next turn: +1 Action; +$1.

Title: Lookout
Description:
+1 Action
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

Title: Smugglers
Description: Gain a copy of a card costing up to $6 that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

Title: Warehouse
Description:
+3 Cards; +1 Action
Discard 3 cards.

Title: Caravan
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Title: Cutpurse
Description:
+$2
Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Title: Island
Description:
Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.
Worth 2 Victory Points

Title: Navigator
Description:
+$2
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Title: Pirate Ship
Description: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +$1 per Coin token you’ve taken with Pirate Ships this game.

Title: Salvager
Description:
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$ equal to its cost.

Title: Sea Hag
Description: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

Title: Treasure Map
Description: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

Title: Bazaar
Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +$1.

Title: Explorer
Description: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

Title: Ghost Ship
Description:
+2 Cards
Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

Title: Merchant Ship
Description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +$2.

Title: Outpost
Description: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn’s Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can’t cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

Title: Tactician
Description: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards; +1 Buy; and +1 Action.

Title: Treasury
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

Title: Wharf
Description: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards; +1 Buy.

Title: Herbalist
Description:
+1 Buy; +$1
When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

Title: Potion
Description: Worth 1◉.

Title: Apprentice
Description:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand.  +1 Card per Coin it costs.  +2 Cards if it has ◉ in its cost.

Title: Transmute
Description: Trash a card from your hand.  If it is an…  Action card, gain a Duchy; Treasure card, gain a Transmute; Victory card, gain a Gold.

Title: Vineyard
Description: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

Title: Apothecary
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.

Title: Scrying Pool
Description:
+1 Action
Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn’t an Action.  Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

Title: University
Description:
+2 Actions
You may gain an Action card costing up to $5.

Title: Alchemist
Description:
+2 Cards; +1 Action
When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

Title: Familiar
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each other player gains a curse.

Title: Philosopher’s Stone
Description: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.  Worth $1 per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

Title: Golem
Description: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

Title: Possession
Description: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

Title: Loan
Description:
Worth $1
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Title: Trade Route
Description:
+1 Buy; +$1 per token on the Trade Route mat.
Trash a card from your hand.Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

Title: Watchtower
Description:
Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.
When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

Title: Bishop
Description:
+$1; +1 VP token
Trash a card from your hand.  +VP tokens equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

Title: Monument
Description: +$2; +1 VP token.

Title: Quarry
Description:
Worth $1.
While this is in play, Action cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.

Title: Talisman
Description:
Worth $1.
While this is in play, when you buy a card costing $4 or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

Title: Worker’s Village
Description: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +1 Buy

Title: City
Description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +$1 and +1 Buy.

Title: Contraband
Description:
Worth $3
+1 Buy
When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can’t buy that card this turn.

Title: Counting House
Description: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

Title: Mint
Description:
You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.
When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Title: Mountebank
Description:
+$2
Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

Title: Rabble
Description:
+3 Cards
Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

Title: Royal Seal
Description:
Worth $2
While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

Title: Vault
Description:
+2 Cards
Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded.  Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

Title: Venture
Description:
Worth $1
When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Title: Goons
Description:
+1 Buy; +$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 VP token.

Title: Grand Market
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$2
You can’t buy this if you have any Copper in play.

Title: Hoard
Description:
Worth $2.
While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Title: Bank
Description:
Worth $?
When you play this, it’s worth $1 per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Title: Expand
Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card.

Title: Forge
Description: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

Title: King’s Court
Description: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

Title: Peddler
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
During your Buy phase, this costs $2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than $0.

Title: Platinum
Description: Worth $5

Title: Colony
Description: 10 Victory Points

Title: Hamlet
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Action.
You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Buy.

Title: Fortune Teller
Description:
+$2
Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

Title: Menagerie
Description:
+1 Action
Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

Title: Farming Village
Description:
+2 Actions
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

Title: Horse Traders
Description:
+1 Buy; +$3; Discard 2 cards.
When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

Title: Remake
Description: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand; gain a card costing exactly $1 more than the trashed card.

Title: Tournament
Description:
+1 Action
Each player may reveal a Province from his hand.
If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck.
If no-one else does, +1 Card, +$1.

Title: Young Witch
Description:
+2 Cards
Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse.Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing $2 or $3 to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

Title: Harvest
Description: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +$1 per differently named card revealed.

Title: Horn of Plenty
Description:
Worth $0.
When you play this, gain a card costing up to $1 per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it’s a Victory card, trash this.

Title: Hunting Party
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action.
Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn’t a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

Title: Jester
Description:
+$2
Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it’s a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise either he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

Title: Fairgrounds
Description: Worth 2VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (round down).

Title: Bag of Gold
Description:
+1 Action
Gain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.

Title: Diadem
Description:
Worth $2.
When you play this, +$1 per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).

Title: Followers
Description:
+2 Cards
Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Title: Princess
Description:
+1 Buy
While this is in play, cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.

Title: Trusty Steed
Description: Choose two: +2 Cards; or +2 Actions; or +$2; or gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile.

Title: Crossroads
Description:
Reveal your hand.
+1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

Title: Duchess
Description:
+$2
Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.
—
In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

Title: Fool’s Gold
Description:
If this is the first time you played a Fool’s Gold this turn, this is worth $1, otherwise it’s worth $4.
—
When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

Title: Develop
Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $1 more than it and a card costing exactly $1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

Title: Oasis
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
Discard a card.

Title: Oracle
Description:
Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.
+2 Cards

Title: Scheme
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

Title: Tunnel
Description:
2 Victory Points
—
When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

Title: Jack of All Trades
Description:
Gain a Silver.
Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.
Draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

Title: Noble Brigand
Description:
+$1
When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn’t reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

Title: Nomad Camp
Description:
+1 Buy; +$2
—
When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

Title: Silk Road
Description: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

Title: Spice Merchant
Trader
Description:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins.
—
When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.

Title: Cache
Description:
Worth $3
—
When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

Title: Cartographer
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Title: Embassy
Description:
+5 Cards
Discard 3 cards.
—
When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

Title: Haggler
Description:
+$2
—
While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

Title: Highway
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
—
While this is in play, cards cost $1 less, but not less than $0.

Title: Ill-Gotten Gains
Description:
Worth $1
When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand.
—
When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

Title: Inn
Description:
+2 Cards; +2 Actions
Discard 2 cards.
—
When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

Title: Mandarin
Description:
+$3
Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
—
When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

Title: Margrave
Description:
+3 Cards; +1 Buy
Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Title: Stables
Description: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

Title: Border Village
Description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
—
When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

Title: Farmland
Description:
2 VP
—
When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $2 more than the trashed card.

Title: Madman
Description:
+2 Actions
Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.
(This is not in the Supply.)

Title: Mercenary
Description:
You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, + $2, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
(This is not in the Supply.)

Title: Spoils
Description:
$3
When you play this, return it to the pile.

Title: Poor House
Description:
+$4
Reveal your hand. -$1 per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of $0.

Title: Beggar
Description:
Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.
___
When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

Title: Squire
Description:
+$1
Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.
___
When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

Title: Vagrant
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.

Title: Forager
Description:
+1 Action; +1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand. +$1 per differently named Treasure in the trash.

Title: Hermit
Description:
Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card that is not a Treasure, from your discard pile or your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3.
___
When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman (from the Madman pile).

Title: Market Square
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy
___
When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

Title: Sage
Description:
+1 Action
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing $3 or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

Title: Storeroom
Description:
+1 Buy
Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded the second time.

Title: Urchin
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.
___
When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

Title: Armory
Description: Gain a card costing up to $4. Put it on top of your deck.

Title: Death Cart
Description:
+$5
You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don’t, trash this.
___
When you gain this, gain two Ruins.

Title: Feodum
Description:
Worth 1 VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck.
___
When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

Title: Fortress
Description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
___
When you trash this, put it into your hand.

Title: Ironmonger
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; a Treasure card, +$1; a Victory card, +1 Card.

Title: Marauder
Description: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

Title: Procession
Description: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly $1 more than it.

Title: Rats
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action
Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).
___
When this is trashed, +1 Card.

Title: Scavenger
Description:
+$2
You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

Title: Wandering Minstrel
Description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

Title: Band of Misfits
Description: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose. This is that card until it leaves play.

Title: Bandit Camp
Description:
+1 Card; +2 Actions
Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Title: Catacombs
Description:
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.
___
When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

Title: Count
Description:
Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.
Choose one: +$3; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

Title: Counterfeit
Description:
$1; +1 Buy
When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.

Title: Cultist
Description:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.
___
When you trash this, +3 Cards.

Title: Graverobber
Description: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from $3 to $6, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.

Title: Junk Dealer
Description:
+1 Card; +1 Action; +$1
Trash a card from your hand.

Title: Mystic
Description:
+1 Action
+$2
Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s the named card, put it into your hand.

Title: Pillage
Description: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.

Title: Rebuild
Description:
+1 Action
Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to $3 more than it.

Title: Rogue
Description:
+$2
If there are any cards in the trash costing from $3 to $6, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.

Title: Altar
Description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $5.

Title: Hunting Grounds
Description:
+4 Cards
___
When this is trashed, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates

Title: Candlestick Maker
Description: +1 Action. +1 Buy. Take a Coin token.

Title: Stonemason
Description:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.
—
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

Title: Doctor
Description:
Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order.
—
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

Title: Masterpiece
Description:
Worth $1
—
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per $1 you overpaid.

Title: Advisor
Description: +1 Action. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

Title: Herald
Description:
+1 Card. +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it.
—
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

Title: Plaza
Description: +1 Card. +2 Actions. You may discard a Treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

Title: Taxman
Description: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

Title: Baker
Description:
+1 Card. +1 Action. Take a Coin token.
—
Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

Title: Butcher
Description: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

Title: Journeyman
Description: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

Title: Merchant Guild
Description:
+1 Buy. +$1.
—
While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

Title: Soothsayer
Description: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.
